title: FU*K THIS GAME
body:
THIS GAME FUCKING SUCKS NOW! YOU CREATED CHAMPS THAT CAN 1v9 WTIH 5 kills. TODAY I HAD A GAME where the mundo had 5 kills and took our whole team 1v9 with three items at 20 minutes in. Delete the champ or stop creating the game riot cause u don't know what u doing.

THE MUNDO BUILT FULL TANK YET CAN DO THE MOST DMG INT EH GAME TELL ME THAT!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=MemesMakeHerWet,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AOp9Hajm,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-05-13T21:21:42.840+0000)
>
> THIS GAME FUCKING SUCKS NOW! YOU CREATED CHAMPS THAT CAN 1v9 WTIH 5 kills at 9 minutes in. TODAY I HAD A GAME where the mundo had 5 kills and took our whole team 1v9 with three items at 20 minutes in. Delete the champ or stop creating the game riot cause u don&#039;t know what u doing.

I was the warwick in this game and I dominated the game, shutdown a yi and set him so far behind. After all of this though I mean had to be a 3-4k gold lead at 15 if not more but our gp fed him 3 kills and he dived us under tier 3 and through our whole base. It was not even close to being balanced even with executioners calling I couldn't stop him. It feels so bad playing against this after I worked for our lead and setting up our team just blown away by this champ. Why even play the game if I am playing it and getting a lead and it doesn't matter because one top laner gives him 3 kills and now their mundo is unkillable. Please do your job.
This just in, fed champions can do stupid shit, more at 11.

In Soviet Russia...

For real tho, you had a fed opponent. It happens.
1 vs 9 isn’t possible. You mean 1 vs 5.
and hes also complaining that a champ that he admits is fed is carrying his team :)
lol u think he was fed thats funny

I didn't think it.


> TODAY I HAD A GAME where **the mundo had 5 kills and took our whole team 1v9 with three items at 20 minutes in.**

you stated it.
lol u think he was fed thats funny. The point is every other lane won by 3 kills yet a mundo can do that.
dude u don't get English or the point of saying 1v9 do u?
Beautifully designed post. I want this in a book.
